questions.question_text: "...jem ā līmbaḍānu _____ chhe te ek vār jāṇī līdhu chhe, pachhī koī rīte manmā sankalp thato nathī je, ‘Līmbaḍo hashe ke nahī hoy?’ Evī rīte game teno sang thāy ane game tevā shāstra sāmbhaḷe paṇ koī rīte karīne Bhagwānnā swarūpno je nishchay karyo hoy temāthī man ḍag-mage nahī, evo je nirutthānpaṇe Bhagwānno nishchay ene ame tadātmakpaṇu kahīe chhīe."
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Vach.Ga.Ma.14 is being tested here.

questions.question_text: “...jem ā līmbaḍānu vṛukṣh chhe te ek vār jāṇī līdhu chhe, pachhī koī rīte manmā sankalp thato nathī je, ‘Līmbaḍo hashe ke nahī hoy?’ Evī rīte game teno sang thāy ane game tevā shāstra sāmbhaḷe paṇ koī rīte karīne Bhagwānnā swarūpno je nishchay karyo hoy temāthī man ḍag-mage nahī, evo je nirutthānpaṇe Bhagwānno nishchay ene ame tadātmakpaṇu kahīe chhīe.”
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Gadhada I-14.

questions.question_text: "Jene Bhagwānno ne santno _____ sahit nishchay hoy tethī Bhagwānne arthe ne santne arthe shu na thāy?"
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Vach.Lo.3 is being tested here.

questions.question_text: “Jene Bhagwānno ne santno māhātmya-gnāne sahit nishchay hoy tethī Bhagwānne arthe ne santne arthe shu na thāy? Ene arthe kuṭumbno tyāg kare, loklājno tyāg kare, rājyano tyāg kare, sukhno tyāg kare, dhanno tyāg kare, strīno tyāg kare ane strī hoy te puruṣhno tyāg kare.”
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Loya-3.

questions.question_text: Āpaṇe to _____ jāvu chhe evo ek sankalp rākhavo.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Swā.Vāto: 1/301 is being tested here.

questions.question_text: Āpaṇe to Akṣhardhāmmā jāvu chhe evo ek sankalp rākhavo.
questions.explanation: This quote is from Swamini Vato 1/301.

questions.question_text: "Keṭalāk siddha thāy chhe ne keṭalāk sarvagna thāy chhe ne keṭalāk _____ thāy chhe ityādik anant prakārnī moṭyap pāme chhe tathā param padne pāme chhe e sarve Bhagwānnī upāsanāne baḷe pāme chhe, paṇ upāsanā vinā koī vāt siddha thatī nathī."
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Vach.Ga.Pr.56 is being tested here.

questions.question_text: “Keṭalāk siddha thāy chhe ne keṭalāk sarvagna thāy chhe ne keṭalāk devatā thāy chhe ityādik anant prakārnī moṭyap pāme chhe tathā param padne pāme chhe e sarve Bhagwānnī upāsanāne baḷe pāme chhe, paṇ upāsanā vinā koī vāt siddha thatī nathī.”
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Pratham-56.
